tool_description: This is a chatroom API. Plug in with your server and lets chat.
title: Chat Rooms

api_list.name: Mars Test Chat
api_list.description: This is a chat API. Users will plug in a server and start a chat room. no screen name required.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://chat-rooms.p.rapidapi.com/localhost6969"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "chat-rooms.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
